#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
  int k,n,c;
  char ch;
  cin>>n;
  while(n--)
    {
      cin>>k;
      c=k;
      if(k<=25)
	{
	  ch=k+'a';
	  for(;ch>='a';--ch)
	    cout<<ch;
	}
      else if(k<=50)
	{
	  ch=k+'a'-25;
	  for(;ch>='a';--ch)
	    cout<<ch;
	  for(ch='z';ch>='a';--ch)
	    cout<<ch;
	}
      else if(k<=75)
	{ 
	  ch=k+'a'-50;
	  for(;ch>='a';--ch)
	    cout<<ch;
	  for(ch='z';ch>='a';--ch)
	    cout<<ch;
	  for(ch='z';ch>='a';--ch)
	    cout<<ch;
	}
      else if(k<=100)
	{
	  ch=k+'a'-75;
	  for(;ch>='a';--ch)
	    cout<<ch;
	  for(ch='z';ch>='a';--ch)
	    cout<<ch;
	  for(ch='z';ch>='a';--ch)
	    cout<<ch;
	  for(ch='z';ch>='a';--ch)
	    cout<<ch;
	}
      cout << endl;
    }
  return 0;
}
